channel.title: CVE Feed for Yonle -- bostr
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Yonle -- bostr

item.title: CVE-2024-41962|2024-08-01T17:45:32.389Z -- yonle -- bostr
item.description: Bostr is an nostr relay aggregator proxy that acts like a regular nostr relay. bostr let everyone in even having authorized_keys being set when noscraper is set to true. This vulnerability is fixed in 3.0.10.

item.title: CVE-2024-41962|2024-08-01T16:30:57.629Z -- yonle -- bostr
item.description: Bostr is an nostr relay aggregator proxy that acts like a regular nostr relay. bostr let everyone in even having authorized_keys being set when noscraper is set to true. This vulnerability is fixed in 3.0.10.
